text: Ivo Niederle (26 December 1929 – 8 January 2021) was a Czech actor, entertainer, and commentator. He was born in Prague. He was known for his stage works at Municipal Theaters of Prague. His best known movie and television roles were in Close to Heaven, Žena za pultem, Coach to Vienna. Niederle died on 8 January 2021 in Prague, aged 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech stage actors Category:Czech television actors Category:Actors from Prague
title: Ivo Niederle
